vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Included with: ῥοιζ-ηδά,
adverb with rushing sound or motion, [Refs 2nd c.BC+]; also ῥοιζ-ηδόν, [NT+5th c.BC+]
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
loudly
with a noise, with a crash, with a roar; a derivative of a Greek noun meaning, "the noise made by a passing arrow," not found in the NT; 2Pet. 3:10*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: con un estruendo, con un ruido espantoso
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: (由某事物引起的又快又大的吵雜聲) 一陣吵雜聲 (彼後3:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: (由某事物引起的又快又大的吵杂声) 一阵吵杂声 (彼后3:10)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: tiếng ầm ầm; tiếng kêu lớn.
